introduction: Enjoy Áróra, our multi-award-winning planetarium show, the only northern lights experience of its kind in the world. Visit the Northern Lights from your home in a 360° virtual reality dome experience.Guided by Áróra, the goddess of dawn, this cinematic adventure invites the audience to join the dance of these mystical lights over Icelandic landscapes.Áróra is a beautiful story about the Northern Lights, combining science and art to create a unique experience. It is a journey through the unique landscape of Iceland and the Arctic, to observe Northern Lights as you have never seen them before.
